patthana15.71:4.1: Saraṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.71:4.2: Saraṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.71:4.3: Saraṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana15.71:5.1: Araṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.71:6.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana15.71:7.1: Saraṇaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.71:8.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.71:9.1: Saraṇaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.71:10.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
